data.text:
2. Travel Fund

Store the amount in a virtual CEB wallet valid for six (6) months and use this to either book a new flight or pay for add-ons (example: baggage allowance, seat selection, etc.).

3. Refund

The process may take up to two (2) months from the date of request.

1. Free Rebooking

Rebook without fare difference for travel up to thirty (30) days from original flight date. The fare difference will apply if the travel period is beyond thirty (30) days from the original flight date.
Affected passengers have been informed and provided with the following options through the Manage Booking portal on the Cebu Pacific website https://t.co/GAB2WoEUdR:

DG 6243/6244 Manila – Boracay (Caticlan) – Manila

5J 140/141 Cebu – Boracay (Caticlan) – Cebu

data.text:
CEB GetGo is now Go Rewards! 

No need to travel with cash. Go get your rewards points… and fly as you please! Download Go Rewards now via https://t.co/rwlXsD25uY https://t.co/nujV3CPtYz
For other questions or concerns, passengers may send a message via Charlie the chatbot on https://t.co/SCMZemThl1
CEB will do its best to inform guests ahead of time if flights are cancelled. If these are done on-the-spot, our ground staff are on standby to assist affected guests.
We continue to monitor the situation across all the airports we fly to. Everyjuan’s safety remains our top priority.
This is a developing situation. As such, there may be more flight changes as the Tropical Storm passes. Guests are urged to check real-time flight status updates via https://t.co/n8RpsOuboq

They may avail themselves of their preferred option online up to two (2) hours before their scheduled time of departure.

We urge passengers to avoid going to the airport unless they have confirmed flights.

Cebu Pacific Advisory 

Tropical Storm Paeng (Nalgae) 

As of October 28, 2022, 3:30PM 

Due to Tropical Storm Paeng (Nalgae), Cebu Pacific has cancelled the following flights from tomorrow, October 29, until October 30, 2022: https://t.co/JBy6auwnrJ

Exactly a month ago today, the passengers of flight 5J 814 experienced a NEO way to fly on our first sustainable flight powered by blended SAF! 

Cebu Pacific is determined to fly everyJuan sustainably. 

Book now at https://t.co/taKDgpUG24. https://t.co/QbGnBGtOiP

data.text:
Other services will operate as planned but please expect that some delays or schedule changes may happen as a result of limited operations.

We urge passengers travelling to and from Cebu to avoid going to the airport unless they have confirmed flights.

2. Travel Fund 

Store the amount in a virtual CEB wallet valid for six (6) months and use this to either book a new flight or pay for add-ons (example: baggage allowance, seat selection, etc.) 

3. Refund 

The process may take up to two (2) months from the date of request.

1. Free Rebooking 

               Rebook without fare difference for travel up to thirty (30) days from original flight date. The fare difference will apply if travel period is beyond thirty (30) days from the original flight date.
Affected passengers have been informed and provided with the following options through the Manage Booking portal on the Cebu Pacific website https://t.co/GAB2WoEUdR :

5J 2505/2506 Manila – Cebu – Manila

5J 2509 Manila – Cebu

5J 140/141 Cebu – Boracay (Caticlan) – Cebu

5J 547 (Oct 26) / 5J 548 (Oct 27) Cebu – Singapore – Cebu

DG 6573/6574 Cebu – Tacloban – Cebu

DG 6066/6067 Cebu – Coron – Cebu

DG 6418/6419 Cebu – Iloilo – Cebu

5J 569/570 Manila – Cebu – Manila

5J 557/556 Manila – Cebu – Manila

5J 559/560 Manila – Cebu – Manila

DG 6503/6504 Manila – Cebu – Manila

5J 2503/2504 Cebu – Manila – Cebu

5J 597/598  Cebu – Davao – Cebu

Cancelled flights on Oct 26 due to limited operations at Mactan Airport

October 25, 2022, 12:30PM

The Mactan Cebu International Airport has resumed partial operations but flights to and from Cebu will be limited from 5am to 5pm. https://t.co/6GvNj6FeyW
Cebu Pacific is currently engaging with the authorities and will provide updates, as necessary.

data.text: We urge passengers travelling to and from Cebu to avoid going to the airport unless they have confirmed flights.

3. Refund 
The process may take up to two (2) months from the date of request.

2. Travel Fund 
Store the amount in a virtual CEB wallet valid for six (6) months and use this to either book a new flight or pay for add-ons (example: baggage allowance, seat selection, etc.)

1. Free Rebooking 
               Rebook without fare difference for travel up to thirty (30) days from original flight date. The fare difference will apply if travel period is beyond thirty (30) days from the original flight date.
Affected passengers have been informed and provided with the following options through the Manage Booking portal on the Cebu Pacific website https://t.co/GAB2WoEUdR :
